
#include<stdio.h>
//#include<conio.h>





int main()
{

int n,k,t2,h,i,j,c1=0,c2=0;

double a,f;
//clrscr();
scanf("%d",&n);
char s[n+1];
scanf("%s",s);
scanf("%lf %lf",&a,&f);
if(a>f)
printf("NO\n");
else
{
for(i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
{
if(s[i]=='L')
c1+=1;
else
c2+=1;

}
if(c1==c2)
printf("YES\n");
else
printf("NO\n");
}

























//getch();


return 0 ;
}
